0047.HK.summary: Hop Hing Group Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates a chain of quick service restaurants. It operates restaurants under the Yoshinoya, Dairy Queen, Uncle Fong, and Chatting brand names in the northern regions of the People's Republic of China. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 597 restaurants. It also engages in the agricultural operations; and provision of management services. Hop Hing Group Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Yuen Long, Hong Kong.

0052.HK.summary: Fairwood Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the operation of fast food restaurants. The company operates in two segments, Hong Kong Restaurants and Mainland China Restaurants. As of March 31, 2019, it operated 148 stores in Hong Kong, which included 138 fast food stores and 10 specialty restaurants; and 11 stores in Mainland China. The company is also involved in the property investment, and trademark and restaurants license holding activities. Fairwood Holdings Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong.

0341.HK.summary: CafÃ© de Coral Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates quick service restaurants, and casual dining chains in Hong Kong and Mainland China. It operates restaurants primarily under the CafÃ© de Coral, Super Super Congee & Noodles, Shanghai Lao Lao, Mixian Sense, The Spaghetti House, Oliver's Super Sandwiches, 360 Series, Little Onion, THE CUP, Don Don Tei, and ZAKKA brands. As of March 31, 2020, the company operated 470 operating units. It also provides institutional catering services under the Asia Pacific Catering and Luncheon Star brands for universities, hospitals, government, and public and private institutions; and produces, distributes, and sells ham, sausage, and bacon products under the Viking Boat brand name. In addition, the company is involved in property investment, premises space and property leasing, and food trading and processing activities; and provision of royalty and franchise services. CafÃ© de Coral Holdings Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Shatin, Hong Kong.

0538.HK.summary: Ajisen (China) Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates a chain of fast casual restaurants in the People's Republic of China and Hong Kong Special Administrative Region. It operates through Operation of Restaurants; Manufacture and Sales of Packaged Noodles and Related Products; and Investment Holding segments. The company's restaurants primarily offer Japanese ramen and Japanese-style dishes under the Ajisen brand. As of December 31, 2019, it had a retail network of 799 restaurants. The company also leases property interests; and invests in financial instruments. In addition, it trades in noodles; and offers management services, as well as operates food processing center. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Yau Tong, Hong Kong. Ajisen (China) Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Favour Choice Limited.

0573.HK.summary: Tao Heung Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates restaurants and bakeries in Hong Kong and Mainland China. The company engages in the provision of food catering services; and production, sale, and distribution of food products and other items related to restaurant operations; and provision of poultry farm operations. It also produces, slaughters, processes, and sells livestock; produces and retails bakery products; and provides management and promotion, treasury, and human resources support services, as well as trades in food and other operating items to restaurant operations. In addition, the company engages in the property investment activities. It operates restaurants under Tao Heung, Tao Square, Cheers Restaurant, Hak Ka Hut, Pier 88, Chao Inn, Chung's Cuisine/Chung's Kitchen, HITEA, Tai Cheong Bakery, One Roast, JOYOUS One CHAO ZHOU CUISINE, Cheers Palace, RingerHut, T CAFÃ 1954, TCT, T.Point, Bakerz 180, and Tao's Kitchen brands. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Tai Po, Hong Kong.

0657.HK.summary: G-Vision International (Holdings) Limited, an investment holding company, operates Chinese restaurants in Hong Kong. The company's restaurants specialize in Chiu Chow cuisine. It also offers management services. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Tsim Sha Tsui East, Hong Kong. G-Vision International (Holdings) Limited is a subsidiary of Kong Fai International Limited.

1181.HK.summary: Tang Palace (China) Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the restaurant operation and food production businesses in the People's Republic of China. The company operates restaurants under the Tang Palace Seafood Restaurant, Tang's Cuisine, Tang Palace, Social Place, Canton Tea Room, Ninja Japanese Restaurant, Ninja House Japanese Restaurant, Pepper Lunch, and PappaRich brands. It is also involved in intangible assets holding, as well as retail and wholesale trading activities. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 59 restaurants. Tang Palace (China) Holdings Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong

1314.HK.summary: Tsui Wah Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates a chain of restaurants and bakery shops. As of March 31, 2020, the company operated 83 restaurants in Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau, and Singapore. It also provides food catering services; offers management services; operates a food factory; owns trademarks; and holds properties. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Kwai Chung, Hong Kong. Tsui Wah Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Cui Fa Limited.

1443.HK.summary: Fulum Group Holdings Limited owns and operates various restaurants in the People's Republic of China. As of March 31, 2019, the company operated 73 restaurants covering 29 restaurants under the Fulum brand; 11 restaurants under the Sportful Garden brand; 33 restaurants under the Fulum Concept line in Hong Kong; and 4 restaurants in Mainland China. It also processes, sells, and distributes food products; provides management services; trades in kitchen utensils and other operating items; owns trademarks; lends money; and holds properties. Fulum Group Holdings Limited was founded in 1992 is headquartered in San Po Kong, Hong Kong.

1483.HK.summary: U Banquet Group Holding Limited, an investment holding company, operates and franchises a chain of Chinese restaurants in Hong Kong and Mainland China. It operates through Chinese Restaurant and Wedding Business, Property Leasing Business, Securities Trading Business, and Environmental Maintenance Business segments. The company operates full-service Chinese restaurants, which offer wedding banquet and dining services, as well as catering services. It also provides environmental maintenance services, including janitorial services on streets and public areas, waste management services, and facility maintenance management. In addition, the company distributes fresh vegetables and fruit, seafood, and frozen meat; and trades in securities. As of December 31, 2019, it operated a total four restaurants under the U Banquet, U Kitchen, and U Pot brands. The company is headquartered in Taikoo Shing, Hong Kong.

1703.HK.summary: Palace Banquet Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates restaurants in Hong Kong. The company offers Cantonese dining and banquet services, including wedding banquet services. As of March 31, 2020, it operated 18 Chinese full-service restaurants under the Palace and Royal Courtyard brand names. The company was formerly known as The Palace Holdings Limited and changed its name to Palace Banquet Holdings Limited in October 2018. Palace Banquet Holdings Limited was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong.

1JT.F.summary: Tsui Wah Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates a chain of restaurants and bakery shops. As of March 31, 2020, the company operated 83 restaurants in Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau, and Singapore. It also provides food catering services; offers management services; operates a food factory; owns trademarks; and holds properties. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Kwai Chung, Hong Kong. Tsui Wah Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Cui Fa Limited.

30D.F.summary: Longhui International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the hotpot restaurant business in the People's Republic of China. The company owns three brands, including Faigo, Xiao Faigo Hotpot, and Hong Yuanwai. It also offers food and beverage service. As of December 31, 2019, it owned and operated 77 restaurants in the People's Republic of China. Longhui International Holdings Limited is based in Central, Hong Kong.

6811.HK.summary: Tai Hing Group Holdings Limited operates as a multi-brand casual dining restaurant company. As of December 31, 2019, it had 205 restaurants operated by franchisees in Hong Kong, Mainland China, Macau, and Taiwan under the Tai Hing, TeaWood, Trusty Congee King, Men Wah Bing Teng, Ph? L?, Tokyo Tsukiji, Fisher & Farmer, Asam Chicken Rice, King Fong Bing Teng, Rice Rule, and Hot Pot Couple brands. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Quarry Bay, Hong Kong. Tai Hing Group Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Chun Fat Company Limited.

8213.HK.summary: StarGlory Holdings Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides food and beverage services. The company operates restaurants, cafÃ©s, and cake shops under the Italian Tomato brand name; the Japanese tonkatsu restaurants under the Ginza Bairin brand; the Japanese curry specialty stores under the Shirokuma Curry brand; and the Japanese izakaya restaurants under the Enmaru brand. As of March 31, 2020, it operated 28 shops in Hong Kong and 6 shops in the People's Republic of China. The company was formerly known as New Wisdom Holding Company Limited and changed its name to StarGlory Holdings Company Limited in April 2019. StarGlory Holdings Company Limited was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. StarGlory Holdings Company Limited is a subsidiary of Oceanic Fortress Holdings Limited.

8371.HK.summary: Taste Gourmet Group Limited, an investment holding company, operates restaurants in Hong Kong. The company operates 30 restaurants under the La'taste, Nabe Urawa, Dab-Pa, Say Cheese, Sweetology, Urawa, Sweetology Takano Ramen, Tirpse, and Rakuraku Ramen, Parkview, The Pho, and Madam Saigon brands. It offers Vietnamese, Japanese, Chinese, and Western cuisines. The company also provides management services. It serves customers in mid-to-high-end market segment. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Sheung Wan, Hong Kong. Taste Gourmet Group Limited is a subsidiary of IKEAB Limited.

It operates through Operation of Restaurants; Manufacture and Sales of Packaged Noodles and Related Products; and Investment Holding segments. The company's restaurants primarily offer Japanese ramen and Japanese-style dishes under the Ajisen brand. As of December 31, 2019, it had a retail network of 799 restaurants. The company also leases property interests; and invests in financial instruments. In addition, it trades in noodles; and offers management services, as well as operates food processing center. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Yau Tong, Hong Kong. Ajisen (China) Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Favour Choice Limited.

It also produces, slaughters, processes, and sells livestock; produces and retails bakery products; and provides management and promotion, treasury, and human resources support services, as well as trades in food and other operating items to restaurant operations. It operates restaurants under Tao Heung, Tao Square, Cheers Restaurant, Hak Ka Hut, Pier 88, Chao Inn, Chung's Cuisine/Chung's Kitchen, HITEA, Tai Cheong Bakery, One Roast, JOYOUS One CHAO ZHOU CUISINE, Cheers Palace, RingerHut, T CAFÃ 1954, TCT, T.Point, Bakerz 180, and Tao's Kitchen brands. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Tai Po, Hong Kong.

The company is also involved in the property investment, and trademark and restaurants license holding activities. Fairwood Holdings Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in North Point, Hong Kong.

SWH.TO.summary: Sunwah International Limited, an investment holding company, provides financial services primarily in Hong Kong. It offers corporate finance and capital markets services, including financing solutions and mergers and acquisitions advisory services, as well as asset management services; and brokerage services, such as equities and futures brokerage, margin financing, and initial public offering subscription services, as well as operates an e-trading platform. The company also invests in listed and unlisted securities, loans, and funds, as well as real estate properties. In addition, it operates a full service Chinese seafood restaurant. The company was formerly known as Kingsway International Holdings Limited and changed its name to Sunwah International Limited in December 2010. Sunwah International Limited was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.
